messages.message:
For model-service I get: `model-service must be run inside Docker`
IF we run it in docker, we might need to add an interactive terminal? `-it`
Yeah, this is why I think a headless debugger is the way to go

@jordy.vlan you could try adding:

```import epdb
epdb.listen()```
To the code, and go from there to unblock yourself

Failed to get it to work with `epdb`; continued with `debugpy`, Draft PR with my attempt here: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67081 (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67081)
Would appreciate help from some experts :wink:
